channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report E-2023080229
item.description:
Report E-2023080229

  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report X-2023080274
item.description:
Report X-2023080274

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-23T18:12:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-24
  • City: JONESBORO
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was sent down the line during the sort. Driver noticed the pacakge was broken, and put aside. After the sort when another QA was walking the lines, he noticed that it was sitting to the side, picked it up, and noticed it was broken. It was immediately brought to the Hazmat cage. There was no spillage outside of package. DescribePack: Glass bottle is broken. There is no other packing besides the cardboard suspension that the glass bottle was resting inside. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: After package was found, it was immediately taken to the Hazmat cage where the fumes could air out. The package had already mostly dried out due to it being alcohol.

item.title: Report X-2023080245
item.description:
Report X-2023080245

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-22T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-24
  • City: FORT SMITH
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found in the trailer belly somewhat leaning on its side and not sitting upright inside of trailer. DescribePack: The cap on the bottle was loose causing a small amount of liquid the come out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package placed in an upright position.
